nodes.text: Anthony Carboni (born September 14, 1980) is an actor who hosted the Celebration Anaheim and Rogue One: A Star Wars Story - World Premiere. As of 2018, Carboni is also the co-host of The Star Wars Show alongside Andi Gutierrez, and in September of 2018, he became the host of the webseries Science and Star Wars. He has also worked on Indie Game: The Movie (2012) and the Doctor Who 50th Anniversary Live Pre-Show (2013).
Along with Andi Gutierrez and Corey Vidal, he was a host for the Star Wars Celebration Anaheim Live.
